review.comment:
Update 6/2022:
Still 5 stars!  Had a sink clog.  They were prompt, professional, and did the job perfectly.  Also flushed out the A/C condensate line.
Cooper is my go-to plumber, always a job well done!  :)

Update to my review from last year:  Still 5 stars!
Annual water heater flush.  Job was done perfectly, professionally, and easy to schedule.  Saved in my phone for all my plumbing needs!
Last year's review:
Have used Cooper’s for several situations, from clearing clogs to Water Heater installation.  Punctual, professional, knowledgeable, and polite.  Explains everything really well, and they charge a fair price for their work.  Will use again!
review.review_reply: Hi Pam burg - This review means a lot to our team at Cooper Plumbing . We are grateful to have been given the opportunity to be your go to plumber throughout the years  . Thank you!

review.comment: I am a big fan of Cooper Plumbing and cannot recommend them enough! In the last year, I’ve call them 3 times for 3 different issues and all 3 plumbers were very knowledgeable, professional and efficient. Scheduling a service call was also quick and easy and I was taken care of right away. Recently, I had a clogged kitchen pipe from putting too many cucumbers down the disposal and James took care of it quickly. The first time, it was a toilet flapper and Scott showed me how to replace it myself since I wasn’t ready to replace an old toilet. Since I was paying for a service call and didn’t have them do the work, Scott also answered my questions about the plumbing considerations of a bathroom remodel. The second time I had a leaking kitchen sink and it turned out that I needed a new faucet. Travis had the perfect one in the truck and replaced it quickly. But when he re-entered my house, he said he smelled gas. I thought I’d been smelling gas for months, but couldn’t figure out where it was coming from. Then, I couldn’t smell it, so I forgot about it. It turns out there was a leak in my gas fireplace, which explained my headaches, and Travis repaired the pipe. I didn’t realize that when you had a gas leak, a plumber is who you called. This detection saved me a lot of money by not calling the gas company, which I learned would come out, turn off the gas and then you still have to call a plumber to handle the repair work. I feel so fortunate Travis noticed this gas smell – it could have led to all kinds of problems undetected. Not knowing anything about plumbing, I really appreciated their patience with my many questions. They are honest and fair and could have easily taken advantage of my lack of knowledge, but didn’t. This company has integrity and is very good at what they do. I won’t hesitate to call them for any future needs.
review.review_reply: Hi Debbie, thank you so much for the feedback! Cooper plumbing works hard to provide this type of experience for our clients and it’s good to hear about how we are doing. We are grateful to get the opportunity to be your go to Houston plumber.
Hi Kevin Hong - We appreciate the review .

review.comment: Terrific communication. Highly recommend.
review.review_reply: Hi B K - Our team appreciates the review and feedback . Thank you !

Not only were they able to order a custom sized tray in a timely manner, Jeremiah back in the office provided very clear and prompt communication regarding our project. They were an amazing price and offered top-tier customer service and a fast turnaround timeline. I would highly recommend Cooper Plumbing to anyone in the Houston area for your plumbing needs.
review.review_reply: Hi Krista Norman - We appreciate the feedback and review! Thank you!

Thank you very much Esteban! Thank you Cooper Plumbing!

review.comment: I chose Cooper Plumbing because they were located nearby, had numerous great reviews, and their website indicated that they were very familiar with tankless water heaters. A real person answered the phone (shock) and was able to schedule my appointment for the same day. Luckily, Travis was my assigned plumber. He was knowledgeable and patient as I explained my problem and was able to explain in layman’s terms the possible solutions. He started with the least expensive and it solved my problem. I can’t comment on how their prices rate with other companies but can only imagine less reputable companies/plumbers would have taken advantage of a senior female to do more than necessary to increase the expense. It’s refreshing to find a company like Cooper Plumbing and I will definitely be calling them for any future needs. If all their plumbers are as personable, qualified, and competent as Travis, I will feel confident in using them again.
review.review_reply: Hi Jo Susa - We appreciate the feedback. Reviews like these are why we go above and beyond to the best of our ability as the local plumber. Thank you!

review.comment: 1st time I’ve used this company. I made an appointment; they were very accommodating to my schedule. review.comment: I recently purchased a townhome and was worried about some potential plumbing issues. David came out and diagnosed the problem, and while he was here, he also took a look at several other things that were listed in the inspection report. Turned out I needed a new water heater (which was not a surprise). He gave us a competitive quote for replacing it, and a couple days later, he and DJ delivered and installed it. Their work was thorough and detailed, and they never hesitated to talk through and address any concerns that I had. Highly recommended.
